author: Joseph Guzman
title: US health official warns of another coronavirus 'peak' if Americans don't continue social distancing | TheHill - The Hill
description: A key member of the coronavirus task force says there could be another peak in the coming weeks if the country fails to follow social distancing guidelines.
content: As U.S. health officials cautioned Sunday the week ahead could be the hardest and saddest week of most Americans' lives due to the coronavirus outbreak, a key member of the White House coronavirus task force is urging citizens to adhere to social distancing g… [+3553 chars]
